items.sentence: How did you get Tom to help you clean out the garage?
Tom has been nice to me, but I still don\'t like him.
Tom burned all of the letters that Mary had sent him.
Tom came to save Mary like a knight in shining armor.
I have two cats. One is white and the other is black.
I think Tom came here to tell us something important.
Tom and Mary haven\'t finished eating yet, have they?
Tom and Mary haven\'t heard from John in a long time.
Tickets are available at the door for thirty dollars.
Tom Jackson founded this university thirty years ago.
